long live! people who have
come to see me... long live!

Are you asking me

I am the daughter-in-law

...My name is Savithri!

That lord Yama (God of Death)

No...No!

He has done injustice in
taking my beloved's life

In spite of us
being newly married..

of this virtuous woman's beloved?

Is this Justice?
Is this fair?

This in injustice

This is an insult
to virtuous womanhood

Madam, Please listen
don't jump down!
Sir, Please come...come!
Sir he's that Madam's...

...Okay...Okay! ...I'll
look after it

called him here!

Hey! you go away...
get lost

Doctor of Human Psychology!
That means....

He's a Doctor for Mentally

Why don't you say it

That's what, I was telling
Honourably!
Who are you?

-So you are his mad junior!
-You just shut up

Somehow talk to her and
bring her down!

-lf we near her, she may

Come on, say, who am I?

One, she has to come down

Your programme is excellent!

Yes, I too watch if, it is

Yes, Doctor!

He's mental...
He's Doctor!

Come little close!
Take a close up shot!
That's nothing, Kailash

Now he has become a little famous

Her life is in Danger!

...How can you do it? ..
She is my patient...

Sir, she's our Patient!
-Go away!

I have acted in many plays

Don't come up! If you

I am ordering you

Motherhood! please don't

Don't be in a haste, Savithri!

S-A-V-l-T-H-R-I..
Virtuous Savithri?

Do you accept me

2 movies on your life too

That's ok

Yes, he only...yuck! he's

Sathyavan, you look like the
Jambavan in Sampoorna Ramayanam

That's why, I am wearing the
anklet you gave me!

-Don't confuse!

...Didn't I teach you a song

Oh dear! look at me..
No...No...I'll sing!

Oh lord Yama!
Are you bidding farewell?
Good! ..excellent! ..Fantastic!
You've got it right!
Please, come on to this!
Watch out!

We will go, not up but down..
Sing man..
Here we go. . .

Oh lord Yama! You're a

You live long! Your philanthrophy

You live a very long life!
live long...live long...

Watch out his publicity
craze!

Pulled the leg!

To cure a patient!

become like that patient himself!

Dr.Bhootham doesn't know anything?

What I mean to say is that
he has become old!

Thinking why to take unnecessary
risk and fall from there

...Total injustice!

Already!

Already they've dislodged me from

the President

What has he got?
look at me! ...

Hey! watch my Grey hair's man!

Useless, Brainless, luckless
Foolish man

livelihood, isn't it?

Now onwards it's going to be
only action!

I am going to reduce
him to ashes!

Kailash...hereafter you
will face only loss
How?

I am going to ruin that
Kailash with just a patient!

Clap...Clap nicely!

You're a mad Doctor!
Why?

Why sorry, I am indeed
Mad people's Doctor isn't it?

...Carry on, there's no
mistake in that!
That isn't it...

If you want to ruin anybody

Thenali is a coward!

But, if he gets scared

Thenali is the synonym

His fear would afflict the town
Hey! man, close the hole

In daytime he's scared of dark
At nights he's scared of daytime

He's scared of
fire as well as water
He's scared...he's scared
He is scared of shadows and women
It is fear all through
Dreams scare when eyes are closed

Thenali is scared of everything
Thenali is scared of everything

Dear, someone else is taking me!
Why are you going of leaving me?
This fear will never end

This fear will never end
The life will also not change

This fear is surging high
and couldn't get any relief
Whatever he does ends in a fiasco

turned out to be festival of lights
Mother's lap is like a temple
He fears everything in this world

Seeing a rope he will be scared
thinking it as a snake

Thunders and lightenings
too scare him
Would prespire even seeing a tree

His walk with fright
would shake the earth

The one who poked you

Are you Tenali?

They said, you get scared
for everything!

Come on, tell me.

You can speak in
any language!

...Come on tell
what scares you?

Are you keeping it for
confidence?

They say lord Shiva

...But for me its fear
that is Omnipresent!
Too much of fear!

It is said that if time (kaalam)
ends one has to die (kaalam)..

I am scared whether my leg (kaal)
would break before that time

I fear poetry, story! I fear
story of Bheema or Raman

I fear eating & seeing
I fear even the door

I fear a little opened door

I've fear of even a
locked door also
I fear even open doors and windows
I fear shadow, nest, cow dung!

I fear ball and also
a flower bouquet!

I fear even the girl
who sports flowers!

I fear the biting dog, cat and
the rat which is eaten by the cat

I fear the trees
with branches spread!

...And also the snake
mounds under the trees!

I fear the Snake & Centipede

I fear crowds and as
well as loneliness!
I fear water and fishes!

I fear insects, sneezing
and dust!

I fear day or night
I fear water or fire!
I even fear the English!

...like this there are many
Phobias in English!

Dr.Panchahbootham saying that I've all
the Phobias and only God can save me

...Saying this, he had sent me
to the God!
When I went there

I fear Chanting, cursing, taking
giving, happiness, enduring

I fear temple bell
and sacred fire!

I fear scolding someone
who comes to beat me

I fear beating someone
who comes to scold me

I fear boats, ships
I fear night and day!

I fear seeing something new
I fear remembering the past

I fear sorrow, speed, disease
hurt, coming & also going!

I fear to live as well
as death

I also fear getting thirsty
at odd hours!

Can you give
some water please?

No, I'll have
from this itself!

Even a Doctor's half left water

Gulp it...Gulp it..and
then tell me!

Not always,
only when I talk about myself
If I talk, others get scared
What?

Still, you being the doctor,
don't be afraid
Doctors are equal to God

Why do you think about it?
Tell about it without thinking

I'll cry even if I tell

You shouldn't cry!

Without crying...you
must tell with a smile!
With a smile?

It is very difficult

In my childhood people used

I too was like that only

At that time, clashes
flared up in our town!

I couldn't understand at that time
why there were clashes?
Still I haven't understood!

Suddenly bombs fell from sky

My parents shouted 'extremists'

Then a bomb fell on
my Father's leg!
leg shattered into pieces!
There was blood all over!

My Mother crying, bandaged
the leg with her saree corner
...Carry on! ...
At that time...

4-5 people wearing Iron hats

In my village all people say
that my Mother was beautiful
This is true!

They killed my Father
with a bullet

Mother into the house!

I got hurt on my head

look son! you're a boy

Your father's
